definitions.definition: A person (professional or slave) who entertained the public by engaging in mortal combat with another, or with a wild animal .
A disputant in a public controversy or debate .
Synonym of heelwalker ( “ Any of the order Mantophasmatodea of carnivorous, wingless insects that superficially resemble a cross between praying mantises and phasmids . ” ) .

main_definition: ( Ancient Rome ) A person (professional or slave) who entertained the public by engaging in mortal combat with another, or with a wild animal .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A disputant in a public controversy or debate .
Synonym of heelwalker ( “ Any of the order Mantophasmatodea of carnivorous, wingless insects that superficially resemble a cross between praying mantises and phasmids . ” ) .
